Question
========

The diameter of bottle caps has a normal distribution with a mean of 36 mm and a standard deviation of 1 mm. Suppose you take random samples of 10, 20 and 40. Which sample distribution has the smallest standard deviation?

Answerlist
----------

* 10
* 20
* 40
* The standard deviations are equally large.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 10:Incorrect
* 20: Incorrect
* 40: Correct
* The standard deviations are equally large...: Incorrect
